thread.title: BRIEF-SOBI Says Received Approval From Health Canada For Once-Daily Dosing Of Orfadin For Treatment Of HT-1

title: BRIEF-SOBI Says Received Approval From Health Canada For Once-Daily Dosing Of Orfadin For Treatment Of HT-1

organizations.name: brief-sobi says received approval from health canada for once-daily dosing of orfadin
brief-sobi says received approval from health canada for once-daily dosing of orfadi

text:
13 PM / Updated 24 minutes ago BRIEF-SOBI Says Received Approval From Health Canada For Once-Daily Dosing Of Orfadin For Treatment Of HT-1 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 17 (Reuters) - Swedish Orphan Biovitrum AB (publ) : 
* SOBI SAYS RECEIVED APPROVAL FROM HEALTH CANADA FOR ONCE-DAILY DOSING OF ORFADIN FOR TREATMENT OF HT-1 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
